meanings.definition: To go on a risky journey or undertaking.
meanings.sent1: She was venturing into the unknown forest.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys venturing to new places.
meanings.sent3: Venturing into the haunted house seemed like a bad idea.
meanings.sent4: Venturing into entrepreneurship is like sailing uncharted waters.
meanings.sent5: The brave knight was venturing into the dragon's lair.

meanings.definition: To dare to do something or go somewhere.
meanings.sent1: I am venturing to ask for a raise at work.
meanings.sent2: They are venturing to climb the mountain despite the risks.
meanings.sent3: Venturing to eat the spicy chili was a bold move.
meanings.sent4: She was venturing to speak up against injustice.
meanings.sent5: Venturing to swim in the deep ocean takes courage.
